title: [BUG] Its about time we fix this...
body:
In champion select, if you hover over a champion's portrait it shows their abilities below (over the chat bar), BUT if someone dodges while you are previewing the abilities, the next time you enter champ select the abilities stay obscuring the chat bar! 

as well as completely losing the chance to call a lane, you cannot communicate to your team or see what your team is trying to communicate to you, which needless to say affects certain key parts of champ select.

replies.body: There is actually a work around for this, if you hover over the champions who's abilities are shown. in this case GP, then move off they should disappear. Sometimes hovering over any champion will make it go away by replacing it then disappearing when you move off. But that's in my experience anyway, when it happened to me it always had the skin portrait square thingy come up on the right too so it could be something similar but slightly different.
yes this made me lose my lane in normals 6 fold
OMG yes I hate this so much RIOT
